name: Languagenut
description: Complete your Languagenut assignments, unlock achievements, earn points and medals - all on your phone.  If you dont already have them, just ask your teacher for your username and password, download the app and log in!  Benefits for you: - Easily keep on top of your Languagenut assignments - From the classroom to the sofa  complete your work anywhere! - Keep track of your results & performance - Just download, log in and have more fun learning languages!  No in-app purchases.
